name: com.kitrum.geeklab-sdk
description: Geeklab SDK is a set of utilities for development in Unity. It includes tools for handling deep links, collecting metrics, managing network requests, and much more.

samples.description: This sample shows how to use the Geeklab SDK in a Unity game. It demonstrates tracking user actions and sending this data to Geeklab, helping developers start using the Geeklab SDK in their own apps.
